Articles.Content:
Kerbals need to chatter in stock KSP, also we need the KIA screens back. Simple as that. Old versions of KSP had KIA screens, and even OLDER versions (pre-release), had Kerbal talking.

Also, maybe even a crew transfer button on the screens that allow you to transfer crew without hunting for crew hatches.

Edited November 29, 2014 by GregroxMun

I vote yes on this.

I like Kerbals talking.
